product_name: Sugoi RSR Shortie Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Find your inner speed demon in the Sugoi RSR Shortie women's shorts. Smooth, stretchy performance fabric and flat seams offer moisture-wicking, chafe-free comfort so you can push your limits. Nylon/spandex blend fabric wicks moisture away from skin, dries quickly and stretches for comfortable fit. Flatlock seams minimize chafing and irritation. The Sugoi RSR Shortie women's shorts feature an inner key pocket and zippered back pocket for small running essentials. Flat waistband features 1.5 in., moisture-wicking supportive elastic waist to secure the fit without binding. Closeout.
short_description: Find your inner speed demon in the Sugoi RSR Shortie women's shorts. Smooth, stretchy performance fabric and flat seams offer moisture-wicking, chafe-free comfort so you can push your limits.
